SYSTEM: 04_OntologyLanguages_RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 51
Multiple optional graph patterns
@prefix foaf:       <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> .
_:a  foaf:name       "Alice" .
_:a  foaf:homepage   <http://work.example.org/alice/> .
:b
foaf:name
"Bob" .
_:b  foaf:name       Bob  .
_:b  foaf:mbox       <mailto:bob@work.example> .
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
SELECT ?name ?mbox ?hpage
WHERE  { ?x foaf:name  ?name .
OPTIONAL { ?x foaf:mbox ?mbox } .
OPTIONAL { ?x foaf:homepage ?hpage }
}
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
101
RDF and RDF Schema
name  
mbox
hpage
"Alice"
<http://work.example.org/alice/>
“Bob"
<mailto:bob@work.example> 
Alternative graph patterns
@prefix dc10:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.0/> .
@prefix dc11:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> .
_:a  dc10:title     "SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" .
_:a  dc10:creator   "Alice" .
_:b  dc11:title     "SPARQL Protocol Tutorial" .
:b  dc11:creator   "Bob" .
_
_:c  dc10:title     "SPARQL" .
_:c  dc11:title     "SPARQL (updated)" .
PREFIX dc10:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.0/>
PREFIX dc11:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
SELECT ?title
WHERE  { { ?book dc10:title  ?title } UNION 
{ ?book dc11:title  ?title } }
title
"SPARQL Protocol Tutorial" 
"SPARQL" 
"SPARQL (updated)" 
"SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" 
SELECT ?x ?y
WHERE  { { ?book dc10:title ?x } UNION 
{ ?book dc11:title
?y } }
x
y
"SPARQL (updated)"
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
102
RDF and RDF Schema
{ ?book dc11:title  ?y } }
SELECT ?title ?author
WHERE 
{ { ?book dc10:title ?title . ?book dc10:creator ?author }
UNION
{ ?book dc11:title ?title . ?book dc11:creator ?author }}
"SPARQL Protocol Tutorial"
"SPARQL"
"SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" 
author
